title: Warden Nautilus gloves?
body:
so clearly in his splash you see he has fingers, meanwhile in his ingame he has no fingers! it's like one of those Bakery gloves!

http://s4.postimg.org/u95un568t/warden_nautilus_complain.jpg

meanwhile his Classic AND his abyssal nautilus BOTH have fingers

this bothers me beyond believe as Warden Nautilus is by far my Favorite skin, can we give him his fingers?

replies.body:
Hiya DoFr! 

In nearly all cases, the in game model will be slightly different than the splash art - whether it be due to lighting, or a slight color change. The in-game model uses a very different medium. While we need to make sure the champion in game can be read from game height, and the color aren't muddled together, these kinds of things aren't necessarily a problem when it comes to creating the splash art. 

This is probably the [worst .gif](http://makeagif.com/hYESxA) I've made, but I wanted to demonstrate that he does have fingers in the in-game model! :]

but wouldn't be easier to use the same fingers from his own classic model?

i mean it would've easily matched the splash art, and would give the ultimate satsfaction, otherwise, pantheon demands his gloves back

but wouldn't be easier to use the same fingers from his own classic model?

i mean it would've easily matched the splash art, and would give the ultimate satsfaction, otherwise, pantheon demands his gloves back
The fingers look defined on the left side.  Right side isn't clear enough.
